trans-unit.source: Provides a static helper class for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]/[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] interoperation with one method, which is used to obtain a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Cursor"></xref> object based on a provided [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] cursor handle.

Returns a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Cursor"></xref> object based on a provided [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] cursor handle.
Setting a custom cursor image requires security permissions even if done in pure [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] programming.
Cursor reference to use for interoperation.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] cursor object based on the provided [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] cursor handle.
